game.name: TableTop Soccer: Redux
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: TTS is back with another fresh take on strategic and tactical games - skill based goal keepers, physics based kicking, 10 player teams, full steam multiplayer, new graphics, offline play and lots more
